The claim was made by a left: leaning advocacy group called Occupy Democrats, which has a history of countering the Republican Tea Party.
The claim was also posted on the website: The Raw Story and Peacock Panache.
The claim was triggered by a controversy: Mark Cole's district regarding a transgender student's use of a girls' lavatory.
Del: Mark Cole's bill does not specify how school officials would verify a student's gender, leading to speculation and debate about how this would be implemented.
